title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions and Q4 '17 has the lowest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The second highest Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is appeared to be the Quarter Q3 '19.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions of Quarter Q4 '19 is 1.24% larger than the minimum value at Q4 '17.
Quarter Q4 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 31.0, followed by Q3 '19, and Q2 '19. Down to Quarter Q4 '17 with the lowest value 25.0.
Overall Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has reduced over the Quarters.
Similar Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is found in Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17.
The lowest value 25.0 at Q4 '17 is almost 1.14 times smaller than the average value 27.08.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is 325.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
